I have assumed that (i) the Loan Documents constitute legal, valid and binding obligations of each of the parties thereto other than the Borrowing Subsidiary, enforceable in accordance with their terms, (ii) there has been no mutual mistake of fact or misunderstanding, fraud, duress or undue influence in connection with the Loan Documents, and (iii) there are no agreements or understandings among the parties, written or oral, and there is no usage of trade or course of prior dealing among the parties that would, in either case, define, supplement or qualify the terms of the Loan Documents.
